Home.description: Join us if you want to earn money while allowing the recycling of the various products you buy!

Save.description: With Back To Life, recycling will be profitable and the world will become cleaner with the increasing number of users.

Work.description: In our system, which is scored according to the types of recycling waste, points are accumulated in your account according to the type and number of waste you discard, and after these points are calculated with the determined coefficients, they are accumulated as money in your account.

Mobile.description: Convert recycling wastes to money in a few steps with a modern and useful interface and contribute to nature!

Account.description: If you want to make money while contributing to nature, you are in the right place.
Account.label: Daily Recycling Count
Account.chartType: The Wastes I Recycle The Most

Footer.header: Join us and start earning while you recycle.

Popup.header: Are you sure you want to log out?
Popup.text1: Or you can find out the current amount of money in your account, track your data using our daily application, and learn your place in the Heroes ranking.
Popup.text2: You can also look at how many points the wastes you recycle are worth according to their types.
